title: Dungloe River Walk Route

description: This circular walk explores the area around the town of in County Donegal. On the way you'll enjoy riverside paths along the Dungloe River and pass close to Long Lough at the eastern end. The eastern section runs along Dungloe Lough and Cope Mountain. There's lovely views across the water to the countryside and hills in the distance. There's also a delightful fairy village with woodland trails and sculptures.
